info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 03 at 8:13PM MDT until June 09 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Glasgow MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Glasgow affecting Valley County. For the Milk River...including Saco, Tampico, Malta, Dodson, Glasgow, Nashua...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Glasgow. * WHEN...From this evening to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, This is flood stage. Expect some low-land flooding to occur. At 26.8 feet, Back trail in Sullivan Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM MDT Saturday the stage was 23.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this evening to 26.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening to 21.3 feet early Tuesday morning. It will rise to flood stage. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.4 feet on 03/09/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Milk River Glasgow 25.0 23.6 Sat 8 pm MDT 25.6 21.6 22.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning by 1100 AM MDT.
